title: Two bagatelles
creator_credit: Grant Munro, Norman McLaren and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Two short Norman McLaren films in which animation technique is employed with live actors. In the first, entitled On the Lawn, a male dancer waltzes to synthetic music. The second is a fast march, In the Backyard, accompanied by an old-fashioned calliope.
